summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements for replacing 'Gold Jewellery' with 'Lehenga' category. The backend includes enum changes and migration logic, while the frontend updates all relevant components (CategoryFilter, ProductForm, AdminProducts, Home, ProductCard) to display 'Lehenga'. However, the ProductCard fallback image still points to 'product-jewellery.dim_600x600.png' instead of a lehenga-specific image, which may be intentional reuse or a naming inconsistency.

hallucinated_features.description: Complete migration module (backend/migration.mo) with data migration logic for converting old products and cart items from goldJewellery to lehenga
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 only requested updating the enum and migrating existing products, but the implementation includes a full migration module with actor state migration, including cart items migration, which was not explicitly requested in the requirements
